name: 2fas-browser-extension
description: This is the official Browser Extension for the Open Source 2FAS project.

scripts.chrome-dev: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Chrome node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.chrome-prod: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && yon run browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Chrome NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.chrome-build: yon run chrome-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon run check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Chrome yon run zip-build
scripts.opera-dev: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Opera node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.opera-prod: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && yon run browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Opera NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.opera-build: yon run opera-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon run check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Opera yon run zip-build
scripts.firefox-dev: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Firefox node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.firefox-prod: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && yon run browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Firefox NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.firefox-build: yon run firefox-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon run check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Firefox yon run zip-build
scripts.edge-dev: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Edge node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.edge-prod: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && yon run browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Edge NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.edge-build: yon run edge-prod && npx -y rimraf ./public/.gitkeep && yon run check-build-directory && npx -y cross-env PLATFORM=Edge yon run zip-build
scripts.safari-dev: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Safari node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.safari-prod: yon run clean && yon run generate-locales && yon run browserlist-update && npx -y cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Safari NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.all-build: npx -y rimraf --glob ./build/* && yon run generate-license-info && yon run chrome-build && yon run opera-build && yon run firefox-build && yon run edge-build
scripts.zip-build: cd ./public/ && npx -y cross-var npx -y bestzip ../build/$PLATFORM_ext_$npm_package_version.zip * & cd ..
